name: Agile World Associates
slogan: Experts in coaching, leadership and delivery for digital transformation projects
description:
Agile World is a digital product and service recruitment consultancy based in Central London. 

We are Agile practitioners who understand what Agile transformation projects look like and need in terms of people.

Supporting companies during their digital transformation journeys and adopting Agile best practices in a way that it works for them.

Our associates are experts in understanding what it really means to lead, coach, facilitate and develop your digital transformation journey and we are looking for the best quality of people to join us in this journey.

team.title: Cheif Agile Delivery Consultant
team.name: Sheetal Thaker
team.bioHtml: Helping teams adopt Agile ways of working in a way that works for them.  With a technical development background, I'm looking to enable new ways of working.

team.title: Cheif Agile Transformation Consultant
team.name: Sheetal Thaker
team.bioHtml: Helping teams adopt Agile ways of working in a way that works for them.  With a technical development background, I'm looking to enable new ways of working.

jobs.title: Co-Founder
jobs.description:
We are seeking a hard working cofounder who has a hunger for making it on their own. 

Innovative, Ambitious, Intelligent and has a 'can do' and 'let's do it' attitude for making things happen. 

I'm looking for someone with:

1. Software development background
2. Deep understanding of agile tools, frameworks and practices
3. Tender writing skills
4. Presentation of pitches for project delivery
5. Deep understanding of customer centric product delivery
6. Digital Sales and Marketing skills 
7. Digital communication strategies
8. End to End digital project development
9. DevOps understanding
10. Active on applying for tenders and pocurement activities
11. Deep understanding of digital development lifecycle
12. Marketing Campaign design and development

Basically an all rounded, deep experienced, hadworking individual who has a passion and drive for success.
